Shaoguan prefecture level city in Guangdong province
Shaoguan prefecture in Guangdong

sentences.english: Soon, the Civil Administration was renamed the northern part of Guangdong Shaoguan area.
sentences.chinese: 不久，粤北行政公署改称韶关专区。

sentences.english: Parts of Shaoguan City in Guangdong Province have been flooded due to the sudden onslaught of heavy rains.
sentences.chinese: 广东省韶关市突然下起了大雨导致部分地区被淹。

sentences.english: "It's not easy to get workers in Shaoguan either, " Mr Chi says.
sentences.chinese: “在韶关，也很难聘用到员工，”迟石庆表示。

sentences.english: I graduated from the 05 Shaoguan bright vocational secondary technical institutes.
sentences.chinese: 我05年毕业于韶关光明职业中等技术学院。

sentences.english: This is the Yunji Mountain in Shaoguan.
sentences.chinese: 没来过吧？这里就是韶关的云髻山。

sentences.english: He graduated in biotechnics of Shaoguan University in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 2007年毕业于广东省韶关学院生物技术专业。

sentences.english: Snowfall is one of the meteorological disasters in Shaoguan.
sentences.chinese: 全市性降雪是韶关市的灾害性天气之一。

sentences.english: This system has been running well since it was put into practice in the Shaoguan smeltery .
sentences.chinese: 本系统在韶关冶炼厂投入运行，效果良好。
